name: One-Arm (V)
Lore: 'When a wampa is wounded, the other members of its pack band together to repel the threat.',
Text: 'Habitat: Hoth sites. Deploys only to a marker site. Wampas are [Selective Creature] creatures. Other wampas are ferocity and defense value +2. Once per game, may deploy Wampa Cave on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.',
